name: Fluff Piece
description:
You live in a dystopian world run by robots. Whilst avoiding capture, you stumble upon a mysterious portal. It looks like a gateway, to a land much more tame and fluffy. Lets paint it red!

Controls:

- W, A, D (Move)
- Left Mouse Button (Shoot)
- R (Restart)

Softwear:

- GameMaker: Studio 1.X
- Photoshop
- Bosca Ceoil
- BFXR
